summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 、 和 方法可以在集合中添加和移除单个控件。The , , and methods enable you to add and remove individual controls from the collection. 你还可以使用 或 方法来添加或删除集合中的所有控件。You can also use the or methods to add or remove all the controls from the collection. 可以 通过将控件传递到方法来确定是否为集合的成员 。You can determine if a is a member of the collection by passing the control into the method. 若要获取集合中的位置的索引值 ，请将该控件传递到方法中 。To get the index value of the location of a in the collection, pass the control into the method. 可以通过调用方法将集合复制到数组中 。The collection can be copied into an array by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 从 派生类的派生类中移除， 前提是它是集合的成员。The following code example removes a from the of the derived class if it is a member of the collection. 该示例要求你已在中创建了一个 、一个 和至少一个 控件 。The example requires that you have created a , a , and at least one control on a . 控件添加到 控件，并将 控件添加到 。The controls are added to the control, and the control added to the . 单击该按钮时， `radioButton2` 会从中删除名为的单选按钮 。When the button is clicked, the radio button named `radioButton2` is removed from the . summary.span: 将指定的控件添加到控件集合中。

span.span: Adds the specified control to the control collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许您向 控件集合的末尾添加对象。The method allows you to add objects to the end of the control collection. 还可以 使用方法将新对象添加到集合中 。You can also add new objects to the collection by using the method. 若要删除 先前添加的，请使用 、 或 方法。To remove a that you previously added, use the , , or methods. > [!NOTE] > 一 次只能分配给一个 。A can only be assigned to one at a time. 如果已是另一个控件的子控件，则在将其 添加到另一个控件之前，会从该控件中删除该控件。If the is already a child of another control it is removed from that control before it is added to another control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加 到 派生类的 。The following code example adds a to the of the derived class . 该示例要求您已经在中创建了一个 控件和一个 控件 。The example requires that you have created a control and a control on a . 单击该按钮后，将 向面板的中添加一个控件 。When the button is clicked, a control is added to the panel's . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#2)]

span.span: The specified control is a top-level control, or a circular control reference would result if this control were added to the control collection.

summary.span: 将控件对象数组添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds an array of control objects to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中包含的对象 `controls` 将追加到集合的末尾。The objects contained in the `controls` array are appended to the end of the collection. 可以使用方法将 一组对象快速添加 到集合，而不是使用方法手动将它们添加 到集合中 。You can use the method to quickly add a group of objects to the collection instead of manually adding each to the collection using the method. 若要删除 先前添加的，请使用 、 或 方法。To remove a that you previously added, use the , , or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将两个 对象添加到 派生类的 。The following code example adds two objects to the of the derived class . 该示例要求您已经在中创建了一个 控件和一个 控件 。The example requires that you have created a control and a control on a . 单击该按钮时，会将两个 控件添加到面板的中 。When the button is clicked, two controls are added to the panel's . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#3)]

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以确保将控件添加到集合中。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method to ensure that the controls are added to the collection.

summary.span: 从集合中移除所有控件。

span.span: Removes all controls from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 方法从父控件中删除整个控件集合。You can use the method to remove the entire collection of controls from a parent control. 若要从集合中移除单个控件，请使用 或 方法。To remove an individual control from the collection, use the or methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 调用 方法不会从内存中移除控件句柄。Calling the method does not remove control handles from memory. 必须显式调用 方法以避免内存泄漏。You must explicitly call the method to avoid memory leaks. 若要将新 对象添加到集合，请使用 或 方法。To add new objects to the collection, use the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例移除 派生类中的所有对象 。The following code example removes all the objects in the of the derived class . 该示例要求你已在中创建了一个 、一个 和至少一个其他控件 。The example requires that you have created a , a , and at least one other control on a . 其他控件将添加到 控件，并 添加到中 。The other controls are added to the control, and the added to the . 单击该按钮时，面板中包含的所有控件都将从中移除 。When the button is clicked, all the controls contained in the panel are removed from the . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#1)]

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以确保从集合中移除所有控件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method to ensure that all the controls are removed from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 连续调用，最后返回的索引将首先检查键匹配项，如果没有匹配项，则从集合的开头开始搜索。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection. 密钥比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果 `key` 参数为 `null` 或空字符串，或者未找到具有指定键的项，则 返回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, or an item with the specified key is not found, returns -1. 的 属性对应于 中的的键 。The property of a corresponds to the key for a in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从控件集合中移除时，将在集合中的一个位置上移所有后续控件。When a is removed from the control collection, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection. 你还可以 使用 方法删除，或使用方法删除所有控件 。You can also remove a by using the method, or remove all controls by using the method. 若要将新 对象添加到集合，请使用 或 方法。To add new objects to the collection, use the or methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 从 派生类的派生类中移除， 前提是它是集合的成员。The following code example removes a from the of the derived class if it is a member of the collection. 该示例要求你已在中创建了 、一个 和一个或多个 控件 。The example requires that you have created a , a , and one or more controls on a . 控件 将添加到 控件，并将该 控件添加到 。The controls are added to the control, and the control is added to the . 单击该按钮时， `radioButton2` 会从中删除名为的单选按钮 。When the button is clicked, the radio button named `radioButton2` is removed from the . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#4)]

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，请确保调用基类的 方法，以确保从集合中移除该控件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method to ensure that the control is removed from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用时，参数所 引用的会 `child` 移动到指定的位置， `newIndex` 而中的其他 引用将重新 排序以容纳移动。When is called, the referred to by the `child` parameter is moved to the position specified by `newIndex` and the other references in the are reordered to accommodate the move. 索引值为零的控件位于 z 顺序的顶部，较大的数字更接近底部。The control with an index value of zero is at the top of the z-order, and higher numbers are closer to the bottom.
